name: static-assets-template
description: Template for web pages developing and after pack them in distributed packages

scripts.index-build-sc: rm -rf dist/uikit && parcel build src/index.html --out-dir dist/wwwroot
scripts.uikit-build-sc: rm -rf dist/uikit && parcel build src/uikit.html --out-dir dist/uikit

author: agot11
